Building.Name: Palace
Building.Description: Indicates this City is the $(captial) Capital of the empire. Connecting other Cities to the capital Capital by Road will produce additional $(gold) Gold.

Building.Name: Barracks
Building.Description: +15 experience for all units trained in the city

Building.Name: Courthouse
Building.Description: Eliminates extra Unhappiness $(unhappiness) from an $(occupied) Occupied City.

Building.Name: Mint
Building.Description: +2 $(gold) on worked gold and silver resources

Building.Name: Stable
Building.Description: +1 $(production) on worked Sheep, Cattle, and Horses resource
